creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: black-and-white 3/4 length portrait of a woman with long dreadlocks or braids, with shorter braids/dreadlocks on the top of her head, with her eyes closed and hands raised with palms facing out; woman wears a headband, beaded necklace with two large gems and two small skulls, and a dark long-sleeved shirt
medium: Graphite powder, pencils, and erasures on paper
provenance: The artist, Washington, D.C.; [Joe Zanatta Contemporary Art, Shawnee, Kansas, sold to Mersky, August 2020]; Robert B. Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2020.
signed: on back in pencil: \"SEE-LINE WOMAN (THE GENERAL)\" / RENÉE STOUT / (2019)
title: See-Line Woman (The General)
